question: What is the title of Taylor Swift's debut album?
funFact: Taylor Swift's self-titled debut album was released in 2006 and marked the beginning of her career in country music.

question: Which Taylor Swift album includes the song 'Love Story'?
funFact: 'Love Story' is one of Taylor Swift's most iconic songs and is featured on her second studio album, 'Fearless,' released in 2008.

question: In what year did Taylor Swift release her album '1989'?
funFact: '1989' marked Taylor Swift's official transition from country to pop music and won the Grammy Award for Album of the Year.

question: Which song earned Taylor Swift her first Grammy Award for Best Music Video?
funFact: The music video for 'Blank Space' won Taylor Swift her first Grammy Award for Best Music Video in 2016.

question: What is the name of Taylor Swift's re-recorded version of her 2008 album 'Fearless'?
funFact: In 2021, Taylor Swift released 'Fearless (Taylor's Version),' a re-recorded version of her 2008 album, as part of her efforts to own her master recordings.

question: Which Taylor Swift song includes the lyrics 'You made a rebel of a careless man's careful daughter'?
funFact: These lyrics are from the song 'Mine,' which is the lead single from Taylor Swift's third studio album, 'Speak Now.'

question: Taylor Swift's album 'Red' features a duet with which British singer-songwriter?
funFact: Ed Sheeran collaborated with Taylor Swift on the song 'Everything Has Changed,' which is featured on her album 'Red.'

question: In which music video does Taylor Swift dress up as a nerdy girl and a popular girl?
funFact: In the music video for 'You Belong With Me,' Taylor Swift plays both a nerdy girl and a popular cheerleader.

question: Which Taylor Swift album won the Grammy Award for Album of the Year in 2010?
funFact: 'Fearless' won the Grammy Award for Album of the Year in 2010, making Taylor Swift the youngest artist to win the award at the time.

question: What is the name of Taylor Swift's 2020 surprise album released during the COVID-19 pandemic?
funFact: Taylor Swift released 'Folklore' as a surprise album in July 2020, featuring a more indie-folk sound compared to her previous work.

question: Which song from Taylor Swift's album 'Reputation' features the line 'I swear I don't love the drama, it loves me'?
A: Look What You Made Me Do
D: This Is Why We Can't Have Nice Things
funFact: The line 'I swear I don't love the drama, it loves me' is from the song 'This Is Why We Can't Have Nice Things' on the album 'Reputation.'

question: Taylor Swift wrote 'Better Man' for which country music group?
funFact: Taylor Swift wrote 'Better Man,' which was recorded and released by the country group Little Big Town.

question: In which city was Taylor Swift born?
funFact: Taylor Swift was born in Reading, Pennsylvania, and raised on a Christmas tree farm in nearby Wyomissing.

question: Which Taylor Swift music video won the MTV Video Music Award for Best Female Video in 2009?
funFact: The music video for 'You Belong With Me' won the MTV Video Music Award for Best Female Video in 2009.

question: What is the title of Taylor Swift's documentary film released on Netflix in 2020?
funFact: 'Miss Americana' is a documentary film about Taylor Swift, released on Netflix in 2020, that gives an intimate look at her life and career.

question: Which song from Taylor Swift's '1989' album features the lyrics 'Got a long list of ex-lovers, they'll tell you I'm insane'?
funFact: These lyrics are from the song 'Blank Space,' one of the hit singles from Taylor Swift's '1989' album.

question: Which Taylor Swift album features the song 'We Are Never Ever Getting Back Together'?
funFact: 'We Are Never Ever Getting Back Together' is one of the lead singles from Taylor Swift's fourth studio album, 'Red.'

question: Taylor Swift's song 'Exile' is a collaboration with which band?
funFact: 'Exile' is a duet with Justin Vernon of Bon Iver and is featured on Taylor Swift's 2020 album 'Folklore.'

question: What year did Taylor Swift release her album 'Speak Now'?
funFact: Taylor Swift released her third studio album, 'Speak Now,' in 2010. It includes hits like 'Mine' and 'Back to December.'

question: Which song did Taylor Swift perform at the 2021 Grammy Awards?
